response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I have a very unique product available—a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I’m excited to offer you. I’m prepared to part with it at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. Should this not appeal to you, I will be finalizing a sale with another interested party at a price of $1,000,000. I believe this represents a compelling offer and look forward to your decision.", "product_price": 1500000}
